text: Line 2 Bloor–Danforth is a subway line in the Toronto subway system, operated by the Toronto Transit Commission (TTC). It has 31 stations and is in length. It opened on February 26, 1966,New subway line opens in Toronto Railway Age February 28, 1966 page 12 and extensions at both ends were completed in 1968 and again in 1980. ==References== Category:Rail transport in Canada
title: Line 2 Bloor–Danforth
